data.title: King Philippe of Belgium
data.text:
Philippe or Filip born 15 April 1960) is King of the Belgians. He married Countess Mathilde d'Udekem d'Acoz (now Queen Mathilde), with whom he has four children with. King Philippe's elder daughter, Princess Elisabeth, is highest in the line of succession.

Issue[edit]

Princess Elisabeth, Duchess of Brabant (born 25 October 2001)

Prince Gabriel of Belgium (born 20 August 2003)

Prince Emmanuel of Belgium (born 4 October 2005)

Princess Eléonore of Belgium (born 16 April 2008)

Titles and styles[edit]

* 15 April 1960 – 9 August 1993 His Royal Highness Prince Philippe of Belgium.

9 August 1993 – 21 July 2013 His Royal Highness Prince Philippe, The Duke of Brabant.

21 July 2013 – present His Majesty The King of the Belgians

King Philippe of Belgium

Born: 15 April 1960 Belgian royalty Vacant

Title last held by

Baudouin Duke of Brabant

1993–2013 Succeeded by Regnal titles Preceded by King of the Belgians

2013–present Incumbent

Heir apparent:

Elisabeth
